## IWaitForExitResult interface

The result of running a process to completion using [Executable.waitForExitAsync()](./node-core-library.executable.waitforexitasync.md)<></>, or [Executable.waitForExitAsync()](./node-core-library.executable.waitforexitasync_1.md)<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IWaitForExitResult<T extends Buffer | string = never> extends IWaitForExitResultWithoutOutput 
```
**Extends:** [IWaitForExitResultWithoutOutput](./node-core-library.iwaitforexitresultwithoutoutput.md)
